settings.text:
Looking for the perfect gift for your bestie? Want to treat yourself to some new wrist candy? Our unique, handmade bracelets are a great choice for any occasion. Explore all our stunning artisan bracelets today!

Shop The Most Unique Handmade Bracelets Online At Pura Vida!

Here at Pura Vida, we believe the simple things in life are meant to be celebrated. In a fast-paced world that never seems to stop, it can be tough to take moments throughout your day to appreciate life’s simple pleasures: the warm sun on your skin, human connection, etc. Let our unique, handmade bracelets serve as a reminder of how life should be lived!

With a seemingly endless selection of artisan bracelets to choose from, you’re going to have a hard time picking just one. But the good news? You don’t have to! Grab a few of your favorites and you’ll have a perfectly unique bracelet for any occasion. Want to learn what makes our collection of artisan bracelets so special? Keep reading!

What Makes Our Unique Bracelets So Special?

It’s easy to see why we have earned the reputation as the #1 place to find unique bracelets online. Our bracelets are crafted by hand using the finest materials available to produce stunning works of art, every time. Your new Pura Vida bracelets are going to turn heads and catch eyes. With over 460,000 five-star reviews, you can rest assured the quality is going to exceed your expectations.

But the bracelets themselves are just part of the reason shopping here with us is so special. We’re building for something bigger than ourselves. Pura Vida originated with the goal to help a few struggling local artisans in Costa Rica. These days, we’re working hard to take this to the next level - by providing sustainable employment to artisan communities around the globe. But that’s not all - we also strive to protect our planet with eco-friendly initiatives and partnerships with amazing charities. We’re proud of the $4 million we’ve donated and the 200+ charities we’ve supported - but we’re just getting started!

All of this is to say that when you buy artisan-crafted bracelets at Pura Vida, you get more than an amazing bracelet you’ll wear for years to come. You get the warm, fuzzy feeling inside knowing you’re helping a greater cause.

All The Different Types Of Artisan Bracelets We Make By Hand:

When we say you can’t beat the Pura Vida selection, we mean it! We’ve got so many different styles of handcrafted bracelets to choose from. We’ve got the basics, like our simple beaded bracelets, string bracelets, or braided bracelets. You’ll also find metal bracelets that will shimmer in the light. For something a bit more personalized, consider our engraved bracelets as a heartfelt personal gift. You can narrow your choices by exploring our bracelets for men or bracelets for women, too.

Unique Handmade Bracelets Aren’t All We Offer - Explore Our Full Catalog Today!

What are you waiting for?! Treat yourself or that special someone to unique bracelets from Pura Vida today! While you’re here, explore our other types of handmade jewlery. We’ve got some super unique handmade anklets or artisan rings that you’re sure to love!
